mapper.select: select userid, productno, pname, pprice, ioriginalname, isavename, imgtype, cartquantity from carts c, products p, productimgs pi where c.userid=#{userid} and c.productno = p.productno and p.productno = pi.productno
mapper.insert: insert into carts (userid, productno, cartquantity) values (#{userid}, #{productno}, #{cartquantity})
mapper.delete: delete from carts where userid=#{userid} and productno=#{productno}
